title: Bill Evans on Marian McPartland's Piano Jazz Radio Broadcast [1
description:
Marian McPartland&#039;s
Piano Jazz
with guest Bill Evans
conversation and music as heard on National Public Radio
Recorded 11-06-1978

There are simply few words left to describe the creative and fertile musical mind that was Bill Evans. THis recorded hour he shared with Marian McPartland is a rare opportunity to experience some of the unique, creative processes that dwelt within this exceptional musician. As this program was recorded less than two years before Evans&#039; untimely death, Marian has not only given us an historic insight into the genius and artistry of one of the most distinctive and influental pianists in the history of jazz, but also, between them, some of the most wonderful piano music imaginable.
